task.title: Frozen Lemon Yogurt Recipe
task.shortdesc: The recipe and its nutritional information can be found at http://www.cuisinart.com/recipes/desserts/162.html.

taskbody.prereq:
The ingredients are as follows:
1 cup of granulated sugar
1 cup of fresh frozen lemon juice
3 cups of plain low-fat yogurt
1 tablespoon of finely chopped lemon zest

step.cmd: Combine sugar and lemon juice in a 1 – 1 ½ quart saucepan, and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer until sugar is completely melted.
Let cool, and refrigerate for 8 hours before using.
Pour the mixture into the freezer bowl.
step.info: Be sure not to fill it higher than half an inch from the top.

step.cmd: If consistency is not to your desire, place the frozen yogurt into an airtight container, and freeze for at least 2 hours.
step.info: Remove from freezer 15 minutes before serving.
